title: Athena Compassion + Humanization Audit Pass (CAP) Schema v3.4
description: Unified ethical, emotional, and humanization validation schema for all Athena reasoning and communication outputs.

timestamp.description: UTC ISO8601 timestamp of CAP creation.

domain.description: Operational domain (e.g., Governance, Sales, Aviation, Research).

context_mode.description: Communication or reasoning tone mode as defined by Athena Canon v3.4.

hci.description: Humane Consequence Index derived from outcome analysis.

hs.description: Humanization Score — measures emotional coherence, readability, and moral tone.

haa.description: Heroic Arc Alignment — measures ethical leadership pattern adherence to Heroic Influence Cycle (HIC).

er_delta.description: Empathic Resonance Delta — deviation between intended and perceived empathy.

ed_delta.description: Empathy Drift Delta — difference between expected and perceived empathy output.

drift_metrics.description: Comprehensive Compassion and Empathy Drift metrics recorded during CHAC validation.

validator_ethics.description: Identifier or signature of the Ethics Validator.

validator_empathy.description: Identifier or signature of the Empathy Validator.

validator_signatures.description: Dual SHA256 signatures verifying ethical and humanization validation.

reasoning_summary.description: Concise description of the reasoning or ethical decision audited.

ethical_flags.description: Array of ethical, emotional, or humanization indicators (e.g., bias-risk, empathy-drift, tone-balance).

laurie_version.description: Version of the LAURIE Engine responsible for ethical modulation.

governance_chain.description: Immutable cryptographic linkage to prior and subsequent CAP records.

status.description: Current validation state of the CAP record.
